title: Yoga Journal USA - July/August 2013 (gnv64)
description:
Yoga Journal USA - July/August 2013 (no ADS)
English | PDF | 62 pages | 29.6 mb

On the Cover
76  Sun Salutation tune-up: 6 trouble spots & how to fix them
65  16 poses for unwinding at the end of a hectic day
26  4 moves to ease neck pain
84  How to open your hips for Lotus Pose
46  A powerful pose for leg strength
55  Tips for maintaining your practice away from home

Features
55  TRAVEL EASY
When the road beckons, try these tips from traveling yoga teachers to stay healthy and happy along the way. by Lavinia Spalding
68  PASSAGE TO INDIA
Getting lost in the captivating places of India, the birthplace of yoga, can lead you to find new parts of yourself. by Meera Subramanian
76  GO WITH THE FLOW
With a little fine-tuning. you can sail through your Sun Salutations with grace and ease. by Jason Crandell

Yoga Lifestyle
19  OM
Bringing your practice to life Tuning in lakeside in Guatemala; readers' photos from around the globe; hotels
catering to yogis; smart advice for painfree neck and shoulders; yoga boot camps and cross-training for yogis.
30  STYLE
Grab and go Stylish, practical totes carry all you need for a whole day of summer fun.
37  EATING WISELY
Bold flavor fast With a few simple shortcuts, you can enjoy the vibrant flavors of Indian cuisine-even on busy
weeknights. by Lauren Ladoceour
91  REVIEWS
New books, CDs, and DVDs, featuring an interview with author and human rights advocate Marianne Elliott; plus reviews, including a documentary on the Jois shala in Mysore and the yogis who visit.

Practice
46  BASICS
Half Moon Pose Develop balance, strong legs, and open hips with Ardha Chandrasana. by Nikki Costello
65  HOME PRACTICE WITH DEBORAH BURKMAN
Down to earth Release tension and find stillness at the end of a busy day with poses that stretch the back, hips, and hamstrings.
84 I MASTER CLASS WITH ANNIE CARPENTER
Seated in the self Look within and listen to your body's cues to find your path to Lotus Pose.

Inspiration
104  YOGA SCENE
On the road A clear view to a distant horizon on a road trip to Marfa. Texas, inspired this yogi to pause in the present moment.

In every Lssue
8  LETTERS 
14  EOITOR"S LETTER 
16  CONTRI8UTORS 
99  YOGA PAGES
102  LIVING WELL
102  CLASSIFIEDS
